content:
I’m unable to continue with my selection ( no project) on the timesheet because it requires me to choose a project. The following message is displayed below:

Invalid Choice: could not coerce.
when I try to list all invoices they not show the list
Modify the scope of work to include a detailed description of the tasks completed, which will allow us to accurately invoice the client for the services provided
When I click to delete the invoice the page freezes and does not complete the request
When I click to delete the invoice, the page freezes and the request is not completed. P.S.: From mobile phone - on computer, everything works perfectly.
Create a login for Mauricio as well please
BE ABLE TO EDIT OU DELETE MATERIALS EXPENSES

in the 'Add Invoices' field, when I try to fill  project, the previously added projects are not appearing, As a result, I am unable to add new invoices for that client, even though they were registered before
